title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 166-3.14 - Committee advisory opinions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 166-3.14 - Committee advisory opinions

State Regulations

Within 15 business days of the receipt of an advisory
opinion issued by the committee, the general counsel to the division shall
respond in writing to the committee stating: (a) the actions that have or will be taken to
comply with the advisory opinion; or
(b) the reasons for disagreement and
noncompliance with the advisory opinion. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
166-3.14

Amended

New

York State Register December 23, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 51, eff. 12/23/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
